headline: Linde (NasdaqGS:LIN) Partners With O-I To Enhance Energy Efficiency In Glass Manufacturing
summary: Linde (NasdaqGS:LIN) recently announced a collaboration with O-I Glass Inc. to implement its OPTIMELTTM Thermochemical Regenerator technology, targeting significant environmental benefits. This development is part of a series of positive moves, including an 8% increase in dividends and a share buyback program. These factors may have influenced the company's share price, which has seen a 7.83% rise over the last quarter. The market overall has shown resilience, with indices like the S&P 500...
